docs.text: Yulai Xie (last update: 2023.6) Visit my GitHub Visit my ResearchGate PhD, Chief Researcher @ Hitachi China Research Lab. Research Area Machine learning Computer vision Crowd simulation Traffic analysis Multi modal analysis Education 2004-2010 Bachelor and Master (engineering) @ Tianjin Univ., China 2010-2014 Ph.D (engineering) @ Hokkaido Univ. with CSC scholarship, Japan Experience 2014-2023 Hitachi China Research Lab. Publications Wang, Xiaohui, Yulai Xie, Yang ZHANG, Xiaoning Pi, and Fang Ren. “Digital Simulation-Based Data Generation for Quality Inspection.” In ICCMS 2013, 6. 2023. Han, Zhenyu, Siran Ma, Changzheng Gao, Erzhuo Shao, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Lu Geng, and Yong Li. “Disease Simulation in Airport Scenario Based on Individual Mobility Model.” ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology, May 20, 2023. https://doi.org/10.1145/3593589. Zhang, Yanfei, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Yiruo Dai, and Fang Ren. “VSSum: A Virtual Surveillance Dataset for Video Summary.” In ICCCV 2022, 7, 2022. Yulai Xie, Jingjing Niu, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. "Multisize Patched Spatial-Temporal Transformer Network for Short-and Long-Term Crowd Flow Prediction", IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems , 2022. http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/TITS.2022.3186707 Jingjing Niu, Yulai Xie(Co-first author), Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Tri-Modal Dense Video Captioning Based on Fine-Grained Aligned Text and Anchor-Free Event Proposals Generator” International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence , 2022. https://doi.org/10.1142/S021800142255014X Shao, Erzhuo, Zhenyu Han, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Lu Geng, and Yong Li. “Interior Individual Trajectory Simulation with Population Distribution Constraint,” ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology , 2022. Xie, Yulai, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Temporal-Aware Graph Convolution Network for Skeleton-Based Action Recognition.” ACM International Conference Proceeding Series , 2021, 83–90. https://doi.org/10.1145/3484274.3484288 . Xie, Yulai, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Temporal-Enhanced Graph Convolution Network for Skeleton-Based Action Recognition.” IET Comput.Vis. , 2022, 266–79. https://doi.org/10.1049/cvi2.12086 . Fan, Xiaojie, Fang Ren, Yulai Xie, Yiying Zhang, Jingjing Niu, Jingyu Zhang, and Jianping Wang. “Mitigating Ambiguity by Deep-Learning-Based Modal Decomposition Method.” Optics Communications 471 (September 2020): 125845. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.optcom.2020.125845. Fan, Xiaojie, Lina Wang, Fang Ren, Yulai Xie, Xiang Lu, Yiying Zhang, Tianwen Zhangsun, Wei Chen, and Jianping Wang. “Feature Fusion-Based Multi-Task ConvNet for Simultaneous Optical Performance Monitoring and Bit-Rate/Modulation Format Identification.” IEEE Access PP (September 2, 2019): 1–1. https://doi.org/10.1109/ACCESS.2019.2939043 . Fan, Xiaojie, Yulai Xie, Fang Ren, Yiying Zhang, Xiaoshan Huang, Wei Chen, Tianwen Zhangsun, and Jianping Wang. “Joint Optical Performance Monitoring and Modulation Format/Bit-Rate Identification by CNN-Based Multi-Task Learning.” IEEE Photonics Journal 10 (September 11, 2018): 1–1. https://doi.org/10.1109/JPHOT.2018.2869972 . Liu, Guojin, Zhenzhi Yin, Yunjian Jia, and Yulai Xie. “Passenger Flow Estimation Based on Convolutional Neural Network in Public Transportation System.” Knowledge-Based Systems 123 (February 1, 2017). https://doi.org/10.1016/j.knosys.2017.02.016 . Xie, Yulai, Satoshi Kanai, and Hiroaki Date. “An Efficient Simulation of Skin Contact Deformation for Virtual Ergonomic Assessments of Handheld Products.” International Journal of CAD/CAM 13 (January 1, 2013): 81–95. Xie, Yulai, Satoshi Kanai, and Hiroaki Date. “Anatomy-Based Variational Modeling of Digital Hand and Its Verification.” In DHM/HCII 2013 , 8026:384–92, 2013. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-39182-8_45 . Patents Patent list Academic Service ICCCV2022 invited talk ICCSM2023 NEWS
